mapper.select: SELECT FACTORY_CD ,WORKACT_SEQ ,PROD_SEQ ,OPER_CD ,OPER_SEQ ,BOM_LEVEL ,OPER_UPCD ,OPER_UPCD_SEQ ,OPER_TOPCD ,OPER_TOPCD_SEQ ,ITEM_CD ,BOM_VER ,BOM_STDT ,OUTCUST_YN ,CUST_CD ,OUTSIDE_OUTDT ,OUTSIDE_INDT ,MOLD_CD ,MOLD_SEQ ,EQUIP_CD ,EQUIP_SEQ ,WORK_DT ,WORKST_DT ,WORKED_DT ,PROD_TYPE_CD ,SABUN_ID ,COALESCE(PO_QTY,0) AS PO_QTY ,COALESCE(ACTOK_QTY,0) AS ACTOK_QTY ,COALESCE(ACTBAD_QTY,0) AS ACTBAD_QTY ,BAD_CD ,WORKACT_BIGO ,CONFIRM_YN ,USE_YN ,WRITE_DT ,WRITE_ID ,UPDATE_DT ,UPDATE_ID FROM MCC907 A WHERE 1=1 AND FACTORY_CD = #{factoryCd} AND WORKACT_SEQ = #{workactSeq}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY WRITE_DT DESC) AS RNUM , PLC_HIS_SEQ , WORK_CNT , ERR_CNT , WORK_CNT - PRE_WORK_CNT AS NOW_WORK_CNT , ERR_CNT - PRE_ERR_CNT AS NOW_ERR_CNT , WRITE_DT , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITE_DATE FROM ( SELECT PLC_HIS_SEQ,WORK_CNT , ERR_CNT , SUM(WORK_CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY WORK_CNT ORDER BY WRITE_DT) AS WORK_CNT_SUM , SUM(ERR_CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY ERR_CNT ORDER BY WRITE_DT) AS ERR_CNT_SUM , COALESCE( LEAD(WORK_CNT, -1) OVER (ORDER BY WRITE_DT), 0) AS PRE_WORK_CNT , COALESCE( LEAD(ERR_CNT, -1) OVER (ORDER BY WRITE_DT), 0) AS PRE_ERR_CNT , WRITE_DT FROM ( SELECT PLC_HIS_SEQ, PLC_CD, WORK_CNT, ERR_CNT, DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY WORK_CNT, ERR_CNT ORDER BY WRITE_DT ASC) AS GROUP_NUM, WRITE_DT FROM MCC908 WHERE EQUIP_CD = #{equipCd} AND PROD_SEQ = #{prodSeq} AND WRITE_DT BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{workDt}||'000000','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD')||'235959','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY WRITE_DT ASC ) A WHERE GROUP_NUM = 1 ) B ORDER BY WRITE_DT DESC LIMIT 200
